title: conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 
for Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science) Order
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister higher education research innovation science) order

title: conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997
conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997
heading: 2. Amii McKeever, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Amii McKeever, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for 
Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science with effect 
from 18 February 2025. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

17 June, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 24th June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [284] 3
